snippet.title: Danchi-zuma no Yuuwaku (団地妻の誘惑) for the NEC PC-88
snippet.description:
Came also out for:

FM-7
MSX
PC-98
Sharp X1


Game description:

Danchi-zuma no Yuuwaku is an adult simulation game with RPG elements.
The player is a condom salesman and has to go from door to door to sell those condoms. However, there are also enemies the player has to fight.
The adult part of this game comes in the sex parts. The player has to have sex with women and try to be in rhythm with their pulse.
